VII.i.4.A.2.c
.
Death Benefits for a Dependent Parent
The parents of a deceased Veteran whose death was SC are eligible for death compensation or DIC.
Note
:  Death compensation is an older VA benefit that is payable if the Veteran died before January 1, 1957.
Reference
:  For more information on death benefits, see
38 CFR 3.4(c)
, and
38 CFR 3.5
.
